text.name: system_description
text.text: The Super Cassette Vision is a home video game console made by Epoch Co. and released in Japan on July 17, 1984, and in Europe, specifically France, later in 1984. A successor to the Cassette Vision, it competed with Nintendo's Family Computer and Sega's SG-1000 line in Japan.

text.name: system_description
text.text: La Super Cassette Vision est une console de jeu vidéo domestique fabriquée par Epoch Co. et sortie au Japon le 17 juillet 1984, et en Europe, plus précisément en France, plus tard en 1984. Successeur de la Cassette Vision, elle a concurrencé la Family Computer de Nintendo et La ligne SG-1000 de Sega au Japon.

text.name: system_description
text.text: O Super Cassette Vision é um console de videogame doméstico fabricado pela Epoch Co. e lançado no Japão em 17 de julho de 1984 e na Europa, especificamente na França, no final de 1984. Sucessor do Cassette Vision, competiu com o Family Computer da Nintendo e Linha SG-1000 da Sega no Japão.
